scripts.pm2:restart: if pm2 show where.land ; then pm2 restart where.land ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for where.land' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop: if pm2 show where.land ; then pm2 stop where.land ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for where.land' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete: if pm2 show where.land ; then pm2 delete where.land ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for where.land' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot: npm ci && npm run build && npm run pm2:stop && npm run pm2:delete && npm run pm2:start
